titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that a NADBank guarantee is not considered a Federal guarantee for purposes of determining the tax-exempt status of bonds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/13/2009--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that a loan guarantee by the North American Development Bank (NADBank) shall not be treated as a federal guarantee for purposes of the tax exclusion for interest on state and local bonds.
